measurements_data.source: UN DESA (United Nations, Department of Economic and Social Affairs). 2014b. "Population of Urban Agglomerations with 300,000 Inhabitants or More in 2014, by Country, 1950–2030 (Thousands)" (UN Doc. No. POP/DB/WUP/Rev.2014/1/F12). In "World Urbanization Prospects: The 2014 Revision." Population Division, Department of Economic and Social Affairs, United Nations. June.
Forouhar, Ali and Kiril D. Hristovski 2012. "Characterization of the municipal solid waste stream in Kabul, Afghanistan." Habitat International, 36(3), 406-413. DOI: 10.1016/j.habitatint.2011.12.024.
measurements_data.comments: Calculated based on a volume of 292,908 cu.m./year using waste density of 413 kg/cu.m., using a specific weight of MSW in Kabul of 413 ± 52 kg/cu.m.
